title: What is the best free offline music player? - Quora

response.answer_text: I wil recommend you to check out BlackPlayer. It is available on Play Store, but I am not sure about Apple App Store. It has a pro version, but the free version is sufficient for any of your needs. It has a good theme, it also has a big library of album covers. You can also customise it's colours, animations and Fonts!!
